name: Fog
overview: As Britain braces for the Nazi onslaught, you begin a dangerous journey across the Atlantic in the battleship America. While Churchill anxiously awaits the reinforcements you bring, use your joystick to guide America through pea soup- thick fog. Score 100 points for each leg of the trip you complete. But beware! The radar system is malfunctioning and a Nazi destroyer sits dead ahead! Using only the brief flashes your radar still provides, can you avoid the German ships and water hazards - or will you collide and force Britain to wait longer as you start over again?
